Class ChessSprites

java.lang.Object
ChessSprites
public class ChessSprites
extends java.lang.Object
This class handles the sprite sheet of the chess pieces. This takes *very* heavy inspiration from https://stackoverflow.com/questions/19209650/example-images-for-code-and-mark-up-qas
